column1: Enables displaying captions for each post as overlay on hover.
column2: Enables displaying captions for each post as overlay on hover.

column1: You must have the LAZY LOAD PRODUCTS AND IMAGES module for this functionality.
column2: You must have the LAZY LOAD PRODUCTS AND IMAGES module for this functionality.

column1: The time (in minutes) the content it will be cached in your browser. (Default is 60)
column2: The time (in minutes) the content it will be cached in your browser. (Default is 60)

column1: Number of images to be pulled from Instagram and displayed. Default: 6
column2: Number of images to be pulled from Instagram and displayed. Default: 6

column1: Sort the images in a set order.
column2: Sort the images in a set order.

column1: Size of the images to get.
column2: Size of the images to get.

column1: Customize what Instafeed fetches. (Tag and Location was removed by Instagram)
column2: Customize what Instafeed fetches. (Tag and Location was removed by Instagram)

column1: Unique id of a user to get
column2: Unique id of a user to get

column2: Username of a user to get

column1: Insert Instagram token that does not auto refresh. This token expires and needs to be changed manually in the widget after expiration.
column2: Insert Instagram token that does not auto refresh. This token expires and needs to be changed manually in the widget after expiration.

column1: Add your tokens in WeltPixel -> Instagram Widgets Settings.
column2: Add your tokens in WeltPixel -> Instagram Widgets Settings.
